ca.cgjennings.graphics.composites

Class MaskComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.graphics.composites.AbstractARGBComposite
      • ca.cgjennings.graphics.composites.BlendMode
        • ca.cgjennings.graphics.composites.MaskComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Composite

    public class MaskComposite
extends BlendMode
    Blends the source into the destination using both an overall and per-channel alpha values.

    • Method Detail

      • createContext

        public AbstractCompositeContext createContext(ColorModel srcColorModel,
                                              ColorModel dstColorModel,
                                              RenderingHints hints)
        Description copied from interface: java.awt.Composite
        Creates a context containing state that is used to perform the compositing operation. In a multi-threaded environment, several contexts can exist simultaneously for a single Composite object.
        Specified by:
        createContext in interface Composite
        Specified by:
        createContext in class AbstractARGBComposite
        Parameters:
        srcColorModel - the ColorModel of the source
        dstColorModel - the ColorModel of the destination
        hints - the hint that the context object uses to choose between rendering alternatives
        Returns:
        the CompositeContext object used to perform the compositing operation.
